name: Cookie without SameSite Attribute
desc: A cookie has been set without the SameSite attribute\, which means that the cookie can be sent as a result of a 'cross-site' request. The SameSite attribute is an effective counter measure to cross-site request forgery\, cross-site script inclusion\, and timing attacks.
solution: Ensure that the SameSite attribute is set to either 'lax' or ideally 'strict' for all cookies.
